name: Reverse primers with the following structure: Adaptor-PrimerID-Genespecificregion (These are the primers used for CDNA synthesis)
Forward primers with the following structure: Adaptor-Linker-Genespecificregion (These are the 1st round PCR forward primers)
Adaptor reverse primer: (This is the 1st round PCR reverse primer and is universal to all fragments)
Universal Adapter with the following structure: AdaptorSequencing-Bindingadaptor (This is 2nd round PCR forward primer with Illumina adapter sequence)
